global.header_description: We provide you  with all information needed for sale, purchase, or rental of real state properties. Browse now through millions of properties and houses.

aboutus.about_heading: It’s Time to learn, to discover, to grow and to invest with
aboutus.about_description: Welcome to EstateBook. An online platform dedicated to serving customers, developers, and sales professionals with all the information they need to make a move and invest in some of the finest and most popular properties.

notFound.not_found_title: Sorry, this page is no longer available!
notFound.not_found_paragraph: Sorry about that! Please visit our Discover page to get where you need to go.

meta.developer_title: Discover your dream home developer's latest projects. Visit Estatebook now!
meta.developer_description: Discover your dream home and learn about the developer's history, updates, and latest projects. It's Estatebook time. Browse now through thousands of units.
meta.discover_title: Discover the endless opportunities of real estate.
meta.discover_description: Discover all what you need to know about the real estate market and browse through thousands of endless opportunities.
meta.home_title: Find the perfect unit with EstateBook
meta.home_description: Find your perfect match now on Estatebook and browse through 1000+ units and now more about Egypt's projects and developers.
meta.privacy_title: EstateBook respects your privacy and protects your data.
meta.privacy_description: EstateBook respects your privacy and protects your personal information. Learn how we collect, use, and share your data in our privacy policy.
meta.wishlist_title: Save your favorite properties to your wishlist for easy viewing and access.
meta.wishlist_description: Save all your favorite properties in your wishlist with a tap. Easily view and compare them at any time.
meta.about_us_title: Discover all what you need about Estatebook now!
meta.about_us_description: Estatebook, your real estate companion. A real estate platform giving you full access to the real estate market. Understand, learn, and discover with Estatebook
meta.compare_title: Compare different units side by side to find the perfect one for you.
meta.compare_discription: With EstateBook, you can view key details like price, location, and amenities for multiple units at once. This makes it easy to find the unit that best meets your needs.

error_pages.error_pages_not_found_title: The page you requested does not exist.
error_pages.error_pages_not_found_paragraph: Try a different page or start again.
error_pages.error_pages_error_paragraph: Try again later or try the options below.
error_pages.error_pages_no_connection_paragraph:
It seems like you don’t have internet access. 
Check your internet connection and try again.
